1.title: Costa Rica

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Baz and and the Mammies travel to Costa Rica, where they attempt to abseil down a 140 foot waterfall, nagviate raging rapids and take 700 dogs for a walk.

2.title: New Orleans

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Baz and the four women head to New Orleans to take on another series of death-defying stunts and challenges, which include joining a gospel choir, learning what okie noodling is and taking part in an eating contest.

3.title: Peru

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Baz and the Mammies head to Peru where they spend a night in the Amazon rainforest, hike in the Andes, battle altitude sickness and visit some ancient Incan ruins.

4.title: Toronto

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Baz, Nancy, and the other three mother head to Toronto where they take a highwire walk between two tower blocks and learn how to hunt deer.

5.title: Dubai

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Next stop: Dubai! Baz and the women plunge down a giant water slide, take to the skies on a tricycle and scuba-dive in a shark-infested tank. Also, will Nancy forgive Baz for joyriding in a stolen Lamborghini?

6.title: Uganda

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: The team visits Uganda where they join a police dog unit, battle the white water of the Nile rapids and learn how to be local bus drivers.

5.title: South Africa

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Baz gets his Mum Nancy Paragliding, Ostrich Riding and Shark Cage Diving. There's also Bungy Jumping from the highest bridge in the World on this exciting and hilarious episode, but does Nancy take the plunge...........

1.title: The Philippines

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Thrill-seeker Baz Ashmawy and his mother, Nancy, visit a prison in Cebu and perform a dance with 700 inmates. Later, they head to the city's Crown Regency Hotel to ride on the Edge Coaster, before Nancy directs rush-hour traffic in Manila and co-pilots a plane to the picturesque island of Coron.

2.title: Scandinavia

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Baz Ashmawy and his mother Nancy's adventures take them to Scandinavia where they undergo a nailbiting gyrocopter ride, drive a colossal tank and charge across the snow on a dog sled. Their trip ends at Santa's Elf School where Nancy is in for a big surprise.

3.title: India

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Baz and Nancy head to India where they soar over the Mehrangarh Fort on zipwire, test their sales skills in one of the country's call centres and visit the famous Temple of Rats.

4.title: Mexico

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Baz and Nancy head to Mexico to taste one of the world's hottest chillies and join a Mexican graffiti gang. Plus, Nancy brings the sounds and the party to Spring Break.

5.title: Texas

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: In Texas, Baz encourages Nancy to drive a monster truck and swing through the air on a 183 foot-high sky-coaster. They end their trip on a working cattle ranch but not before each discovers how much the other has to hide during a lie detector test.

6.title: Japan

episode of.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Baz and Nancy conclude their trip by visiting Japan where Nancy gets a makeover from one of the country's top stylists. The pair also battles the elements in a disaster simulator and visits a gambling den where nothing turns out to be quite what it seems.

imdb.plot outline: Series of adventure and thrill seeking activities that Dubliner Baz entices his 70 year old Mother Nancy into participating in, just because she can. When does adrenalin enduced fun have to stop. Definitely not at 70 as Baz and Nancy show us.
imdb.title: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy
akas: 50 Ways to Kill Your Mammy (United Kingdom)
plot: A comedy programme of way Baz tries to scare his 70 year old mammy to death(not literally). Suitible for all the family.::Diana-Maria O'Reilly
